definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: We don't change things out of personal prejudice.
sentences.chinese: 不要因为个人成见而改变事物的本来面目。

sentences.english: Give yourself permission to be a fool and see things for what they really are.
sentences.chinese: 允许自己变成愚人，看事物的本来面目。

sentences.english: We are restoring history's original face.
sentences.chinese: 我们在重现历史的本来面目。

sentences.english: Show the staff at Senor Frog’s just exactly what you’re made of.
sentences.chinese: 青蛙先生显示出你的本来面目。

sentences.english: March 1O Everlasting perspective helps you keep things in their proper light
sentences.chinese: 永恒的视野可以帮助你看到事物的本来面目。

sentences.english: What the world originally looked like?
sentences.chinese: 世界的本来面目是什么样的？

sentences.english: Intelligence is quickness in seeing things as they are.
sentences.chinese: 智慧就是迅速看出事物本来面目的能力。
